CustomField.description: ** System Calculated ** The scheduled end time.
CustomField.formula: IF( OR( VALUE( MID( TEXT( EventApi__End_Date_Time__c + (VALUE(SUBSTITUTE(SUBSTITUTE(LEFT(TEXT(EventApi__Event__r.EventApi__Time_Zone__c), 10),"(GMT",""),":","."))/24) ), 12, 2 ) ) = 0, VALUE( MID( TEXT( EventApi__End_Date_Time__c + (VALUE(SUBSTITUTE(SUBSTITUTE(LEFT(TEXT(EventApi__Event__r.EventApi__Time_Zone__c), 10),"(GMT",""),":","."))/24) ), 12, 2 ) ) = 12 ), "12", TEXT( VALUE( MID( TEXT( EventApi__End_Date_Time__c + (VALUE(SUBSTITUTE(SUBSTITUTE(LEFT(TEXT(EventApi__Event__r.EventApi__Time_Zone__c), 10),"(GMT",""),":","."))/24)), 12, 2 ) ) - IF( VALUE( MID( TEXT( EventApi__End_Date_Time__c + (VALUE(SUBSTITUTE(SUBSTITUTE(LEFT(TEXT(EventApi__Event__r.EventApi__Time_Zone__c), 10),"(GMT",""),":","."))/24) ), 12, 2 ) ) < 12, 0, 12 ) ) ) & ":" & MID( TEXT( EventApi__End_Date_Time__c + (VALUE(SUBSTITUTE(SUBSTITUTE(LEFT(TEXT(EventApi__Event__r.EventApi__Time_Zone__c), 10),"(GMT",""),":","."))/24) ), 15, 2 ) & " " & IF( VALUE( MID( TEXT( EventApi__End_Date_Time__c + (VALUE(SUBSTITUTE(SUBSTITUTE(LEFT(TEXT(EventApi__Event__r.EventApi__Time_Zone__c), 10),"(GMT",""),":","."))/24) ), 12, 2 ) ) < 12, "AM", "PM" )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: ** System Calculated ** The scheduled end time.
CustomField.label: End Time
